name: Snipsnip
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021: Theme - Joined Together

How to play:

- WASD: Move

- Space: Switch between scissors & thread

- 1-4 players (the more the better) (1 kinda lonely)

Goal:
- In thread mode attach thread to pins to encircle areas

- Completing circles grants points for each pin encircled

- In scissors mode run into thread to destroy it

- Highest score wins
